original: Åkerberg, Eva Nanna Maria, läroverksadjunkt, Uddevalla, f. 1/8/93 i Sollefteå av kontr |prosten Karl A. o. Elisabet Almquist. — Studiex. 12, fil. kand. i Upp’s. 17, fil. mag. 20, provar v. norra real i Sthlm 22-23. Lär. v. Sollefteå h. a. 1. 18, v. Norrköp. h. folksk. 18-19, S. Almquists sk. 20-22, Motala h. a. 1. 2:3-25, ord. ämneslär. i Svalöv 25, adj. i tyska o. eng. v. Uddevalla h. a. 1. sed. 38.
translated: Åkerberg, Eva Nanna Maria, high school teacher, Uddevalla, born August 1, 1893 in Sollefteå to parish priest Karl A. and Elisabet Almquist. — Graduated from high school in 1912, Bachelor of Arts in Uppsala in 1917, Master of Arts in 1920, substitute teacher at Norra Real in Stockholm 1922-1923. Teacher in Sollefteå starting in 1918, at Norrköping public school 1918-1919, S. Almquists school 1920-1922, Motala high school from 1923 to 1925, regular subject teacher in Svalöv from 1925, German and English teacher in Uddevalla starting in 1938.
